import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../Context/AuthContext'; import { useCart } from '../../Context/CartContext'; import UniversalNavbar from '../Nav/UniversalNavbar'; const Checkout = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { items, totalItems, totalPrice, clearCart } = useCart(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [shippingDetails, setShippingDetails] = useState({ firstName: user?.name?.split(' ')[0] || '', lastName: user?.name?.split(' ').slice(1).join(' ') || '', email: user?.email || '', phone: '', address: '', city: '', state: '', zipCode: '', country: 'Sri Lanka' }); // Redirect if cart is empty useEffect(() => { if (items.length === 0) { navigate('/cart'); } }, [items, navigate]); // Calculate order summary from cart items const orderSummary = { items: items, subtotal: totalPrice, discount: 0, shipping: 0, tax: totalPrice * 0.15, total: totalPrice * 1.15 }; const getCategoryIcon = (category) => { switch (category) { case 'water-bottles': return 'ðŸ¥¤'; case 'filters': return 'ðŸ’§'; case 'spare-parts': return 'ðŸ”§'; default: return 'ðŸ“¦'; } }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setShippingDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleConfirmShipping = () => { // Validate required fields const requiredFields = ['firstName', 'lastName', 'email', 'phone', 'address', 'city', 'state', 'zipCode']; const missingFields = requiredFields.filter(field => !shippingDetails[field]); if (missingFields.length > 0) { alert('Please fill in all required fields'); return; } setStep(2); }; const handleProceedToPayment = () => { console.log('Proceed to Payment button clicked!'); console.log('Current step:', step); console.log('Setting step to 3...'); setStep(3); }; const handleBackToShipping = () => { setStep(1); }; return (
{/* Header */}

= 1 ? 'text-blue-600' : 'text-gray-400'}`}>
= 1 ? 'bg-blue-600 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200'}`}> 1

= 2 ? 'text-blue-600' : 'text-gray-400'}`}>
= 2 ? 'bg-blue-600 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200'}`}> 2
Payment
{/* Main Content */}
{step === 1 && (

)} {step === 2 && (

Order Confirmation

Shipping Address

{shippingDetails.address}
{shippingDetails.city}, {shippingDetails.state} {shippingDetails.zipCode}
{shippingDetails.country}

Email: {shippingDetails.email}

Order Items

{orderSummary.items.map((item, index) => (
{getCategoryIcon(item.category)}

{item.name}

Qty: {item.quantity}

${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

))}
)} {step === 3 && (

Payment Information

Order Summary

Subtotal: ${orderSummary.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Tax (15%): ${orderSummary.tax.toFixed(2)}
Shipping: Free
Total: ${orderSummary.total.toFixed(2)}

Payment Method

)}
{/* Order Summary Sidebar */}

Order Summary

{/* Cart Items */}
{orderSummary.items.map((item, index) => (
{getCategoryIcon(item.category)}

{item.name}

Qty: {item.quantity}

${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

))}
Subtotal ({totalItems} items) ${orderSummary.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping Free
Tax (15%) ${orderSummary.tax.toFixed(2)}
Total ${orderSummary.total.toFixed(2)}
); }; export default Checkout;
